messages.title: Just two weeks from now
messages.content: Charles Kennedy will keep speaking up strongly for the Highlands & Islands as our local MP; OR Labour will be able to take the Highlands & Islands for granted – and nothing will change.

messages.title: Labour has let the Highlands down...
messages.content: Did they stand up for ordinary families? Did they put our troops' safety first? Did they give the Highlands a fair deal? More of the same? Labour don't deserve to win

messages.title: Charles Kennedy puts Highlands & Islands first
messages.content: Charles is OUR voice at Westminster, not London's voice at the Highlands. The experienced choice for the Highlands. A local voice with a national reputation. A record of action for hospitals and job creation.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work with the Lib Dems to make the £10,000 you earn Income Tax free.
Rebuild a fairer economy after Labour's recession. Focus regional growth on green jobs and clean energy, boosting local wages and apprenticeships.
Work to campaign for a fair fuel policy in Parliament. Fight for a fairer deal on fuel duties.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour will be able to take the Highlands & Islands for granted – and nothing will change. The Conservatives finished more than 15,000 votes behind last time and the SNP came fourth.

issues.economy: Rebuild a fairer economy after Labour's recession.
issues.environment: Focus regional growth on green jobs and clean energy.
issues.health: A record of action for hospitals.

leaflet.personalStatement: Charles is OUR voice at Westminster, not London's voice at the Highlands.

politicalExperience.achievements: A record of action for hospitals and job creation.

images.caption: Change that works for you – over the page
